# core.syntax

Functions to add and get syntax definitions.

```lua
local syntax = require "core.syntax"
```

## items

```lua
(field) items: table
```

---

## plain_text_syntax

```lua
(field) plain_text_syntax: table
```

---

## add

```lua
function core.syntax.add(t: any)
```

---

```lua
function core.syntax.get(filename: any, header: any)
  -> table|unknown
```
